text: Amazing doctor. She goes beyond her duty serve patient as her passion. She owns the clinic but she is so friendly and knowledgeable. My wife came for some medical treatment and doctor also performed a detailed scan for my 7 month pregant wife. She gave aassessment of the scan and was very assuring on our baby growth based on her findings and shes very knowledgeable. The clinic is super clean and my daughter love the little playground. We have a found a gem in Gelang Patah. Well done Klinik Asperia.

I went on holiday to JB last week, and unfortunately, my newborn baby had a high fever. I took him to a clinic referred by my sister, where a doctor named Sayi treated my son. He explained everything in detail regarding other health issues as well. The best part is that he charged a really reasonable price compared to other places. Thank you so much, Doctor!

Highly Recommend clinic and very friendliness and thoroughness explanation from the Doc

I had a wonderful experience at this clinic! During my first trimester of pregnancy, I was struggling with a bad flu and a terrible cough. Dr. Shiva and Dr. Sayi took exceptional care of me with so much patience and compassion. They made sure I was comfortable, reassured me every step of the way, and provided the right treatment without compromising my pregnancy. I‚Äôm so grateful for their support during such a vulnerable time. Highly recommend this clinic to anyone looking for caring and attentive doctors!
